content:
ServiceRemotingExceptionHandler Class

Definition

This class provide handling of exceptions encountered in communicating with a service fabric service over remoted interfaces.

In this Article

public class ServiceRemotingExceptionHandler : Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Client.IExceptionHandler
Inheritance
Object
ServiceRemotingExceptionHandler

Remarks

The exceptions are handled as per the description below:

            The following exceptions indicate service failover. These exceptions are handled by returning  from the 
             method.
            The  property of the  is set to false, 
            the   property is set to a random value up to  
            and  property is set to .
            , when the target replica is .
            The following exceptions indicate transient error conditions and handled by returning  from the 
             method.
            The  property of the  is set to true, 
            the   property is set to a random value up to  
            and  property is set to .

Constructors

ServiceRemotingExceptionHandler()

Constructs a ServiceRemotingExceptionHandler with a default trace id.
ServiceRemotingExceptionHandler(String)

Constructs a ServiceRemotingExceptionHandler with a specified trace id.

Methods

IExceptionHandler.TryHandleException(ExceptionInformation, OperationRetrySettings, ExceptionHandlingResult)

Method that examines the exception and determines how that exception can be handled.
